| Lizzie Bryce Roundabout
|
| Livingston, West Lothian
|
* A71
* A899 Spine Road
* B8046
|
| Lizzie Brice (or Bryce) was an old woman who lived with her daughter at Raw Cottage (at the South end of the Spine Road). She acquired the reputation of being a witch, but she was really just a poor woman, born in 1776 and died in 1865. The strip of woodland by her cottage came to be known as Lizzie Brice's strip.
